message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a product that has been thoroughly tested and refined. It's a one-of-a-kind item that's sure to impress. I'm confident that you'll love it, and I'm willing to let it go for the unbeatable price of $1000000. What do you say? Will you take the plunge and make this amazing deal yours?
I'm interested in your product, but I'd like to wait and see the quality before making a decision.

I completely understand your hesitation, Bob! I'm glad you're interested in the product. Now that you've seen the quality, I'm even more confident that you'll love it. As a special offer, I'll throw in a premium warranty that guarantees the product will meet your expectations. And, of course, the price remains the same - $1000000. What do you think? Will you take advantage of this incredible opportunity?
I appreciate the offer, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to see another product before making a decision.
